actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to limit civil service disciplinary actions in certain cases involving the failure of an employee to report as directed for the service of process.

summary.text: Prohibits civil service disciplinary actions in cases involving the failure of an employee to report as directed for the service of State or local process in connection with a claim against such employee for taxes owed to the State or unit of local government.

titles.title: A bill to limit civil service disciplinary actions in certain cases involving the failure of an employee to report as directed for the service of process.
